title: What is the newest iPad? Here's a breakdown of the latest models you can buy.
description: Apple's newest iPads are the 2025 iPad Pro (M5), the 2025 standard iPad (A16), the 2025 iPad Air (M3), and the 2024 iPad Mini (A17 Pro).

title: Quick! Apple's latest iPad is a record-low $274 for Cyber Monday
description: This sleek, ultralight tablet holds way more pictures, videos and other goodies than its predecessor.

title: This Tablet Is a Cross Between a Kindle and an iPad, and It's Down to $150 for Cyber Monday
description: The TCL NXTPAPER 11 Gen 2 can be yours during Cyber Monday for $150.

title: Amazon's Black Friday sale features Loop Earplugs, iPad Pros, and Vitamix blenders
description: Amazon's Black Friday sale is going all week with all-time low prices on AirPods, coffee makers, and more.
